data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Gao, Xia, Huang, Min (2012): Review of Genus Zyginella LÖw (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Zyginellini) with Description of Four New Species and a New Genus from China. Zootaxa 3180: 19-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213309
